description: Golden metrics for November 16-30.odt (multi-page ODT newsletter). Critical for validating ODT→Markdown fidelity and blank output bug fix.

to_markdown.notes: Newsletter ODT converts to plain markdown without code blocks or embedded images. Validates that ODT→Markdown preserves text content without blank output regression.

to_html.notes: HTML conversion should produce similar-sized output with proper tag structure. Validates HTML generation doesn't produce blank output.
